ClickableTool - Class in Unnamed Package
 
ClickableTool(LayerObserver, UndoTool) - Constructor for class ClickableTool
ClickableTool is mainly used to represent the properties of any tool that is used through a Clickable/Button Mainly this class specifies if a tool has an affect on the following: - Does the Tool needs to update the Undo History when used - Does the Tool Rasterize Shape Layers by modifying them (for example drawing on a shape layer) - Does the Tool needs to update the Layers Panel when used
